body:
Comment 4: 
I'm sorry Dmitry, but I do not understand what you're trying to tell me. I suppose it's
my fault, honestly. I _can_ see why your example code will not work, but I fail to find
how it's connected to the example code @2 nor to the related proof it. Therefore I also
don't understand how I could do something like "The same way you can prove that the
following is a correct mutex.". 

Perhaps you can help me to understand all of the above by pointing out to a specific
failure(s) in the previously presented proof. It has only 4 steps/formal legs above the
initial conditions, so it should be hopefully easy to do. I'd glad to know where the
error is.
